argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mgm2nsgrp.s | |- S = { A , B } |
| 2 |  | mgm2nsgrp.b | |- ( Base ` M ) = S |
| 3 |  | mgm2nsgrp.o | |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. S , y e. S |-> if ( ( x = A /\ y = A ) , B , A ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_hashprdifel | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ A =/= B ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mgm2nsgrplem1 | |- ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S ) -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( A e. S /\ B e. S /\ A =/= B ) -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mgm2nsgrplem4 | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> M e/ SGrp ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_jca | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> ( M e. Mgm /\ M e/ SGrp ) ) |
